trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos utilizados para controlar e gerir grupos relacionados de controlos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartCollection é uma coleção só de leitura de controlos, normalmente utilizadas por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlos para gerir conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a WebPartCollection object to keep a list of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control uses a WebPartCollection object to track the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo utiliza um objeto de WebPartCollection para manter uma lista de todas as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla numa página, ao passo que um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlo utiliza um objeto de WebPartCollection para controlar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos que contém.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The WebPartCollection collection contains both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones and used as part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > WebPartCollection a coleção contém os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos e outros controlos de servidor (por exemplo, controlos de utilizador, controlos personalizados e controlos do ASP.NET) que são colocados em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas e utilizados como parte das aplicações de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: So, for example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, both controls will be in the WebPartCollection collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sim, por exemplo, se tiver um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>numa página de zona e, dentro da mesma, declarar personalizadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo e o ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>controlo, ambos os controlos será na coleção WebPartCollection referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de WebPartCollection existe para que o conjunto de controlo de peças Web possam funcionar com coleções com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can get a reference to a WebPartCollection object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se pretender efetuar operações em massa num conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, pode obter uma referência a um objeto de WebPartCollection utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to loop through all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page and change their appearance in some way.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode querer percorrer todas as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos numa página e alterar o seu aspeto de alguma forma.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Even though the WebPartCollection object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Apesar do objeto de WebPartCollection é só de leitura, pode efetuar alterações programáticas para as propriedades dos controlos subjacentes referenciadas na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância vazia do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de WebPartCollection inicializa uma instância vazia da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O objeto em si é só de leitura e não tem qualquer método para adicionar individuais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos ao mesmo; por conseguinte, terá de pouca occasion para utilizar este construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> object by passing in an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> objeto mediante a transmissão num <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCollection constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class by passing in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de WebPartCollection inicializa uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>classe mediante a transmissão de uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of controls, and pass that to the WebPartCollection constructor.
trans-unit.target: Embora um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto é só de leitura e não há nenhum método para adicionar os controlos individuais ao mesmo, pode criar os seus próprios <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>colecção de controlos e que a este construtor WebPartCollection.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe criar coleções personalizadas e efetuar operações em massa nos mesmos.

trans-unit.source: You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Também pode aceder aos controlos subjacentes na coleção e alterar os respetivos valores de propriedade através de programação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: webParts is .
trans-unit.target: webPartsis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se um determinado controlo existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O método contém permite-lhe verificar um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>de objeto e determinar se faz parte de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que é verificado para determinar se está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se um determinado controlo está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção para uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo é útil quando pretender monte uma matriz de personalizado que pode conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto, um subconjunto desses controlos ou um superconjunto desses controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> objetos que contém a coleção copiada.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de partida da matriz no qual pretende colocar o conteúdo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição de um membro da coleção específica.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf é útil se tiver vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos de uma página de peças Web e de precisam de saber a posição de um controlo relativamente ao outros ordinal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica a posição de um determinado objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um membro da coleção com base na respetiva posição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object by index, and change their property values or call methods.
trans-unit.target: O indexador Item permite-lhe aceder subjacentes <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto pelo índice e alterar os respetivos valores de propriedade ou chamar os métodos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de uma determinada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um membro da coleção com base no identificador de uma cadeia exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: O indexador Item permite-lhe aceder a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto, de acordo com um identificador exclusivo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O peças Web o conjunto de controlo executa uma correspondência sensível nesta propriedade, pelo que a sensibilidade às maiúsculas e minúsculas não faz parte de um único `id` valor.

trans-unit.source: The Item property also works to identify members of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object in some specialized cases.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item também funciona para identificar os membros de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>objeto em alguns casos especializados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Em case de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlos, o indexador é capaz de corresponder ao identificador para o controlo subordinado subjacente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Em case de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>controlos, o indexador corresponde ao identificador para o controlo com base numa comparação entre sensível a `id` parâmetro e uma o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O identificador único para um determinado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa coleção.

trans-unit.source: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of id.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro na coleção cujo ID igual ao valor de id .
